attributes.action: improve the quality of music coverage on the terrestrial network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The music coverage on the TV is at an all time low. You either get poncey, chin stroking, art bores on the BBC, or you get some fashion-victim wannabe who aren’t aware of any bands existing before the Libertines and are barely bright enough to read an autocue on channel 4.

I here petition the prime minister to improve the quality of music coverage on the terrestrial network.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
